text.0: for some is soma purified some sit by sacrificial oil.
text.1: to those for whom the meath flows forth even to those let him depart.
text.2: invincible through fervour those whom fervour hath advanced to heaven.
text.3: who showed great fervour in their lives even to those let him depart.
text.4: the heroes who contend in war and boldly cast their lives away.
text.5: or who give guerdon thousandfold even to those let him depart.
text.6: yea the first followers of law laws pure and holy strengtheners.
text.7: the fathers yama fervourmovedeven to those let him depart.
text.8: skilled in a thousand ways and means the sages who protect the sun.
text.9: the Ṛṣis yama fervourmovedeven to those let him depart.
